name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RX-cli - a client for testing RSockets

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RX-cli - a web client for testing RSocket APIs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help you to test your RSocket API. It supports RSockets via the WebSockets protocol, so you will be able to test your server with this client. Though rsockets is a binary protocol, it will automatically deserialize the request and response to json. It supports following actions: Request/Response, Fire and Forget and Request Stream. The Request Channel action is in implementation for now.
